name: Last Half of Darkness: Tomb of Zojir
name_original: Last Half of Darkness: Tomb of Zojir
description:
Last Half of Darkness: Tomb of Zojir is an adventure game developed by WRF Studios. It was originally released in 2009. It was published by Tri Synergy.
You can play Last Half of Darkness: Tomb of Zojir on PC.
